-I was calling-- -I know.
I didn't have my phone on me.
My phone was at one place, and my body was at another.

and I fell on the ground, and I was carried out

-Here's my proof. -Oh, God.
-Yeah. -Are you okay?

-Fine. -It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you, too.

-Thanks. -[both speaking Spanish]

-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you, too.
